title: I get Caitlyn traps are apart of her gameplay identity
body:
But can she not place a trap directly underneath you. It's cancer playing against double snare/hook bot lanes like 

{{champion:51}}  + {{champion:53}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:143}} 

It's literally stun after stun and there's no room for error in these lane or else you're dead

Also if you guys don't want to remove the traps from under tower at least cut the duration of  the traps cause being under your tower for 90 seconds doing nothing is completely fun right?

replies.body: {{champion:202}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:67}}  can all chain their CC with a supports. Its simply how the game works.

they can't drop multiple snares at a time, that's the difference 

A Cait with a multi CC support can just chain snare you for days if they do it right
You're telling me some support can stun/keep you in place long enough for 4 seconds straight?
{{champion:89}} Amateurs.
{{champion:111}} Sometimes these noobs just weigh me down.
{{champion:53}} Pathetic fleshlings.
{{champion:12}} What, only TWO hard CC abilities?

But Naut has three also....

inb4 joke -> head
He actually has 4

His Q "stun", his Passive snare, his ult knockup.

What's the fourth hard cc?
He makes you blush irl whenever he notices you
Humorous as it is, if Leona is able to chain CC you 4 seconds, including the trap, I don't think you'd be alive for the second trap to happen.

{{champion:412}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:53}} 

4 seconds? perhaps not but they have self chain cc.

Except they can. Jhin and Morg can chain their snares, as Morg's Q marks targets. Jinx can throw down Chompers wherever her support CC'd someone, and they'll get snared. Vayne is a bit harder to pull of, but you can use a Thresh or Blitz to position people in a way you can condemn into a wall.

that's not what I said.

jhin and jinx have 1 CD, cait has multiple traps

Enemy champions who step on a trap set it off, rooting them for 2 seconds, during which they take increased damage from Headshot, grant True Sight of themselves for 9 seconds, and become immune to Yordle Snap Traps for 4 seconds while they remain in the area.

Copy pasta'd that from the wiki
Problem is the area is actually quite small. I found myself surprised by that when playing as cait to notice how it works.

The 4 seconds counts down from the moment you're snared

There are a lot of supports that can lock you down for 2 seconds or more on their own

Iirc the main ones capable of that are {{champion:89}} {{champion:25}} and{{champion:111}} and a few out-liers. 
Otherwise other support champions have to land their CC either after the Trap duration has ended. 

It's possible to chain CC, but it's not possible to double up with every support that happens to have CC.

So stop stepping into her traps.  They're zoning tools that punish you for being an idiot and can only be reliably applied to a target who is already CC'd.  Thus, if you don't step into her trap first, they can't chain CC you unless the support has an additional 2 seconds of crowd control after the initial CC, which is a lot rarer.
True, but they then cant hit you with a super crit afterwards for free.
Jhin fourth shot, Jinx crit rockets, Vayne tumble crits.

If we are talking about laning then only Jhin counts out of those 3, and he has to hold onto his 4th shot for when his support decides to initiate - meaning it's still less guaranteed than Cait. Jinx and Vayne aren't critting you that early unless they get super lucky with cheesy 1% from runes.
But those are not guarantees. Cait trap, no matter what, is going to let you get a crit, that does even more then a regular crit, at an absurd range.

Technically, it's not a crit, it's her headshot+flat bonus damage and hurts more than her ult, but it's not a crit.
However, the headshot AA CAN be a crit, leading to even more absurd damage later on...

I know what you mean but it hurts to read when people put "literally cancer"

like no it isn't literally cancer

it isn't a disease in which abnormal cells divide uncontrollably and destroy body tissue

it's just metaphoric cancer, or cancer for short
Some would say, its literally not cancer.
Definitely not cancer.

what pisses me off more is when they call it down syndrome

what makes it have a third 21 chromosome?
why is it called down syndrome in the first place..
FTFY
The only change I think that Caitlyn needs is that traps should be removed faster under turrets; nothing else is needed. Chaining CC has always been a part of the game
how about make it so that she can't make GA a useless item. it's completely stupid that she can place a trap under you during your GA animation and insta-kill you with a headshot when you get up.
To be fair, isn't that basically the case for every champ with hard CC?

Eh like Morg has to time it right so her Q is fired slightly before the GA animation stops. Cait can plop it down before the animation even starts. Weird thing to complain about but I admit that would feel pretty awful if it happened to me

I thought Cait's identity was to be the sniper of League.

At least until {{champion:202}} came along and did that identity four times better.
I would upvote you, but it appears you already have 4 points.

If you get hit by a skillshot, you deserve to get CCd some more.

It's how the game works.
*Skill* shot

as a caitlyn main,i can say that the only thing that can be done about caitlyn's traps would be to make the range scale meaning that until she upgrades her W the range is smaller and she has to be realy close to you to do the trick.

As someone who really hates Caitlyn, that actually seems like a really good idea for how to nerf chaining traps with other cc, especially if they can nerf maxing traps first a bit (I think that used to be a thing, I'm not sure if it still is). Maybe have it scale with levels rather than ranks in w?
but tbh caitlyn is not "op" currently 48% winrate at 30% playrate is not that bad.
I don't think she's really overpowered, I just hate laning against her.
Can people stop using the word "literally" incorrectly? Downvoted on that alone. It isn't an a word to put emphasis on a statement.
They are just not being literal with their use of "literally."
I have a better idea. Reduce the range to 300-400.

That's a bit harsh given her identity as the siege ADC. Can't siege if the second you try to set up for a siege you get exploded. 300 range is basically melee AA range. 

I think 550-650 would be better. That way if she tries to put a trap down you can at least AA her for doing it.

For the record its 800 range atm
Okay, add travel time to that (think Teemo style, throwing traps) and you got yourself a deal. xD
DEAL. Boom, balanced. WE FIXED YOUR GAME, RITO.
traps just need to go back to 3 max. the charge system is 10/10 the problem is she gets 5 of them now.
